verses.text: Two \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w after|strong="G2532"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w wedding|strong="G1062"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Cana|strong="G2580"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*’ \w mother|strong="G3384"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w*.

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w himself|strong="G1519"\w*, \w too|strong="G2532"\w*, \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G1519"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*, \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w invited|strong="G2564"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w wedding|strong="G1062"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w*, \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w wine|strong="G3631"\w* \w ran|strong="G5302"\w* \w short|strong="G5302"\w*, \w his|strong="G2192"\w* \w mother|strong="G3384"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, ‘\w They|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w wine|strong="G3631"\w* left.’

\wj ‘\+w What|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w do|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w you|strong="G4771"\+w* want \+w with|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1473"\+w*?’\wj* \w answered|strong="G3004"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*. \wj ‘\+w My|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w time|strong="G5610"\+w* \+w has|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3768"\+w* \+w come|strong="G2240"\+w* \+w yet|strong="G2532"\+w*.’\wj*

\w His|strong="G4160"\w* \w mother|strong="G3384"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w servants|strong="G1249"\w*, ‘\w Do|strong="G4160"\w* \w whatever|strong="G3739"\w* \w he|strong="G3739"\w* tells \w you|strong="G5210"\w*.’

\w There|strong="G1563"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w standing|strong="G2749"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w* \w six|strong="G1803"\w* \w stone|strong="G3035"\w* water-jars, \w in|strong="G2596"\w* \w accordance|strong="G2596"\w* \w with|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jewish|strong="G2453"\w* rule \w of|strong="G2596"\w* \w purification|strong="G2512"\w*, \w each|strong="G2596"\w* \w holding|strong="G5562"\w* \w twenty|strong="G1417"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w thirty|strong="G5140"\w* \w gallons|strong="G3355"\w*.

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* servants, \wj ‘\+w Fill|strong="G1072"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* water-jars \+w with|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w water|strong="G5204"\+w*.’\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w*, \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2532"\w* filled \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* brim, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* added, \wj ‘\+w Now|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w take|strong="G5342"\+w* \+w some|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w out|strong="G2532"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w carry|strong="G5342"\+w* \+w it|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w to|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* Master \+w of|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the|strong="G2532"\+w* feast.’\wj* \w The|strong="G2532"\w* servants \w did|strong="G2532"\w* \w so|strong="G2532"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w*, \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* Master \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* feast \w had|strong="G2532"\w* \w tasted|strong="G1089"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w water|strong="G5204"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w had|strong="G2532"\w* \w now|strong="G1161"\w* \w become|strong="G1096"\w* \w wine|strong="G3631"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w knowing|strong="G1492"\w* \w where|strong="G4159"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2532"\w* \w come|strong="G1096"\w* \w from|strong="G2532"\w* – \w although|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w servants|strong="G1249"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w had|strong="G2532"\w* \w taken|strong="G1096"\w* \w out|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w water|strong="G5204"\w* \w knew|strong="G1492"\w* –

\w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w called|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* groom \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, ‘\w Everyone|strong="G3956"\w* \w puts|strong="G5087"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w wine|strong="G3631"\w* \w on|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* table \w first|strong="G4413"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* inferior \w wine|strong="G3631"\w* afterwards, \w when|strong="G3752"\w* \w his|strong="G3956"\w* guests \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w drunk|strong="G3184"\w* \w freely|strong="G3184"\w*; \w but|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w kept|strong="G5083"\w* back \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w wine|strong="G3631"\w* \w until|strong="G2193"\w* \w now|strong="G2532"\w*!’

\w This|strong="G3778"\w*, \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w first|strong="G3588"\w* \w sign|strong="G4592"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G1519"\w* mission, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w gave|strong="G4160"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Cana|strong="G2580"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w revealed|strong="G5319"\w* \w his|strong="G1519"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G1519"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*.

\w After|strong="G3326"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G2597"\w* \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Capernaum|strong="G2584"\w* – \w he|strong="G2532"\w*, \w his|strong="G1519"\w* \w mother|strong="G3384"\w*, \w his|strong="G1519"\w* brothers, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G1519"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*; \w but|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w stayed|strong="G3306"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w* \w only|strong="G3756"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w few|strong="G3756"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w*, \w as|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jewish|strong="G2453"\w* \w Passover|strong="G3957"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w near|strong="G1451"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w went|strong="G2424"\w* \w up|strong="G1519"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*.

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w Temple|strong="G2413"\w* Courts \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w people|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w selling|strong="G4453"\w* bullocks, \w sheep|strong="G4263"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w pigeons|strong="G4058"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w money|strong="G2773"\w* \w changers|strong="G2773"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* counters.

\w So|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w made|strong="G4160"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* whip \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w cords|strong="G4979"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w drove|strong="G1544"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w out|strong="G1537"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Temple|strong="G2413"\w* Courts, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w sheep|strong="G4263"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* bullocks \w as|strong="G2532"\w* \w well|strong="G2532"\w*; \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w scattered|strong="G3956"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w money|strong="G2855"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w money|strong="G2855"\w* \w changers|strong="G2855"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* overturned \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w tables|strong="G5132"\w*,

\w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* pigeon-dealers, \wj ‘\+w Take|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w these|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w things|strong="G3778"\+w* away. \+w Do|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* turn \+w my|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w Father|strong="G3962"\+w*’s \+w house|strong="G3624"\+w* \+w into|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w a|strong="G2532"\+w* market \+w house|strong="G3624"\+w*.’\wj*

\w His|strong="G3754"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w remembered|strong="G3403"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w scripture|strong="G1125"\w* \w said|strong="G3754"\w* – “Passion \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w your|strong="G3588"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w* \w will|strong="G1510"\w* \w consume|strong="G2719"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w some|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* religious authorities \w asked|strong="G3004"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G3004"\w*, ‘\w What|strong="G5101"\w* \w sign|strong="G4592"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w you|strong="G3754"\w* \w going|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w show|strong="G1166"\w* \w us|strong="G3004"\w*, \w since|strong="G3754"\w* \w you|strong="G3754"\w* \w act|strong="G4160"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w way|strong="G3778"\w*?’

\wj ‘\+w Destroy|strong="G3089"\+w* \+w this|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w temple|strong="G3485"\+w*,’\wj* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w his|strong="G1722"\w* answer, \wj ‘\+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w I|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w will|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w raise|strong="G1453"\+w* \+w it|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w three|strong="G5140"\+w* \+w days|strong="G2250"\+w*.’\wj*

‘\w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w Temple|strong="G3485"\w*,’ \w the|strong="G1722"\w* authorities \w replied|strong="G3004"\w*, ‘\w has|strong="G3778"\w* \w been|strong="G2532"\w* forty-six \w years|strong="G2094"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w building|strong="G3618"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w going|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* “\w raise|strong="G1453"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*”?’

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G3004"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w speaking|strong="G3004"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w his|strong="G4012"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w* \w as|strong="G1161"\w* \w a|strong="G1161"\w* \w temple|strong="G3485"\w*.

Afterwards, \w when|strong="G3753"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2424"\w* \w risen|strong="G1453"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*, \w his|strong="G2532"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w remembered|strong="G3403"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* passage \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w scripture|strong="G1124"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w words|strong="G3056"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w had|strong="G2424"\w* \w spoken|strong="G3004"\w*.

\w While|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G1510"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*, \w during|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w Passover|strong="G3957"\w* \w Festival|strong="G1859"\w*, \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w came|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w trust|strong="G4100"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w saw|strong="G2334"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w signs|strong="G4592"\w* \w of|strong="G3686"\w* \w his|strong="G1519"\w* mission \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w he|strong="G1161"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w giving|strong="G4160"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w did|strong="G1097"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w put|strong="G3956"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w in|strong="G3956"\w* \w their|strong="G1438"\w* power \w because|strong="G1223"\w* \w he|strong="G1161"\w* \w knew|strong="G1097"\w* \w what|strong="G3588"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G3956"\w* \w their|strong="G1438"\w* hearts.

\w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w did|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w need|strong="G5532"\w* \w anyone|strong="G5100"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* tell \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w about|strong="G4012"\w* \w people|strong="G1510"\w* \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w could|strong="G2192"\w* read \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*.
